data.lyric:
[ti:Saturday Nights]
[ar:Khalid]
[al:Free Spirit]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Saturday Nights - Khalid
[00:03.75]Lyrics by：Khalid Robinson/Ryan Vojtesak/Jamil Chammas
[00:07.50]Composed by：Khalid Robinson/Ryan Vojtesak/Jamil Chammas
[00:11.26]Saturday nights blueberry cigarillos
[00:15.34]Swishers make my throat hurt
[00:17.30]Rolling OCB's on the side for me
[00:20.07]Light 'em up and let 'em both burn
[00:22.45]Family feuds say your mom's confused
[00:25.60]Off of s**t she doesn't wanna learn
[00:28.11]But daddy's gone say he's never home
[00:31.69]And wishing only makes it worse
[00:33.97]I guess there's certain dreams that you gotta keep
[00:39.83]'Cause they'll only know what you let 'em see
[00:44.70]All the things that I know
[00:47.27]That your parents don't
[00:49.95]They don't care like I do
[00:52.90]Nowhere like I do
[00:55.89]And all the things that I know
[00:58.68]That your parents don't
[01:01.35]They don't care like I do
[01:04.30]Nowhere like I do
[01:07.11]Nowhere like I do
[01:13.14]Nowhere like I do
[01:19.54]Saturday nights light gray Silverado
[01:23.89]You drive it 'cause you have to
[01:25.72]Stay up working late at a job you hate
[01:28.68]Fix your makeup in a dirty bathroom
[01:31.11]No more love in and out of clubs
[01:34.74]Knowing what you gotta do
[01:36.95]You've got plans wrapped in rubber bands
[01:39.82]And that's the only thing you'll never lose
[01:42.57]I guess there's certain dreams that you gotta keep
[01:48.17]'Cause they'll only know what you let 'em see
[01:53.36]All the things that I know
[01:55.81]That your parents don't
[01:58.49]They don't care like I do
[02:01.50]Nowhere like I do
[02:04.53]And all the things that I know
[02:07.21]That your parents don't
[02:09.73]They don't care like I do
[02:12.92]Nowhere like I do
[02:15.72]Nowhere like I do
[02:19.27]'Cause I care I care about you
[02:24.91]There's nowhere I'd rather be
[02:26.99]Than right here around you
[02:30.87]I care care about you
[02:36.22]There's nowhere I'd rather be
[02:38.91]All the things that I know
[02:41.59]That your parents don't
[02:44.06]They don't care about you
[02:46.84]Nowhere like I do
[02:50.51]All the things that I know
[02:52.96]That your parents don't
[02:55.64]Don't care about you
[02:58.63]Nowhere like I
[03:01.46]Nowhere like I do
[03:06.20]Do do do
[03:07.59]Nowhere like I do
[03:11.93]Do do do
[03:13.11]Nowhere like I do
[03:17.61]Do do do
[03:18.81]Nowhere like I do
[03:23.35]Do do do
data.trans:
[ti:Saturday Nights]
[ar:Khalid]
[al:Free Spirit]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.75]//
[00:07.50]//
[00:11.26]周六晚上 点了根蓝莓雪茄
[00:15.34]抽了口 瞬间我喉咙发痛
[00:17.30]再为自己卷了根**
[00:20.07]拿起来把它们都点着
[00:22.45]因为家庭不和 你母亲过得苦恼
[00:25.60]也无力改变现状
[00:28.11]你爸也走了 他再也不回这家了
[00:31.69]祈求上天垂怜并不能改变什么
[00:33.97]但我希望你仍心怀梦想
[00:39.83]只为世人能看到你身上的光芒
[00:44.70]我都知道
[00:47.27]你的父母根本不会
[00:49.95]他们不会像我这般在乎
[00:52.90]像我这般在乎你
[00:55.89]我都明白
[00:58.68]你的父母根本不会
[01:01.35]他们不会像我这般在乎
[01:04.30]像我这般在乎你
[01:07.11]像我这般在乎你
[01:13.14]像我这般在乎你
[01:19.54]周六晚上 开着浅灰雪佛兰
[01:23.89]你很赶时间 因为你不得不
[01:25.72]熬夜地加着你讨厌的夜班
[01:28.68]你把化妆品胡乱的放在脏乱的浴室里
[01:31.11]无所依恋 花天酒地
[01:34.74]我知道你需要放纵
[01:36.95]也知道你有不可告人的秘密
[01:39.82]这是你不会放弃的唯一
[01:42.57]但我希望你仍心怀梦想
[01:48.17]只为世人能看到你身上的光芒
[01:53.36]我都知道
[01:55.81]你的父母根本不会
[01:58.49]他们不会像我这般在乎
[02:01.50]像我这般在乎你
[02:04.53]我都明白
[02:07.21]你的父母根本不会
[02:09.73]他们不会像我这般在乎
[02:12.92]像我这般在乎你
[02:15.72]像我这般在乎你
[02:19.27]只因我很在乎 我很在乎你
[02:24.91]我哪儿也不去
[02:26.99]我只想在你身边
[02:30.87]我在乎 我很在乎你啊
[02:36.22]我哪儿也不去
[02:38.91]我都知道
[02:41.59]你的父母根本不会
[02:44.06]他们不会像我这般在乎
[02:46.84]像我这般在乎你
[02:50.51]我都知道
[02:52.96]你的父母根本不会
[02:55.64]根本不在乎你
[02:58.63]像我这般
[03:01.46]像我这般在乎你
[03:06.20]在乎你
[03:07.59]像我这般在乎你
[03:11.93]在乎你
[03:13.11]像我这般在乎你
[03:17.61]在乎你
[03:18.81]像我这般在乎你
[03:23.35]在乎你
